title: 业务指标监控仪表板
description: 业务关键指标和用户行为分析

targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "login" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT count(*) FROM application-logs WHERE event_name = "login_failure" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "order_created" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "order_completed" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT properties.product_name, count(*) as view_count FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "product_view" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY properties.product_name ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT properties.payment_method, count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "order_completed" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY properties.payment_method
SELECT count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "cart_add" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "cart_remove" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT count(*) FROM business-events WHERE event_name = "cart_clear" AND time > NOW() - 24h GROUP BY time(1h)
